pkgmetadata.longdescription: Survival Mediation Analysis of High-Dimensional Proteogenomic Data // SMAHP (pronounced as SOO-MAP) is a novel multi-omics framework for causal mediation analysis of high-dimensional proteogenomic data with survival outcomes. The full methodological details can be found in our recent preprint by Ahn S et al. (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2503.08606.
